page.title: 11Ponteland Industries
page.content: {Meadowfield }is a small {Industrial } estate in Ponteland which consists of a variety of concerns.Many local people are employed here along with a considerable number from the area as far afield as 20 miles.The total number employed on the Industrial estate is about 300. There are factories which make sweets electrial fuses and curry paste.Many of the others provide a service such as large scale {printing works,}and {industrial waste disposal,and a {builder.}There are two Local Authority services,{County Council Highways {Depot,}and Northumberland County Council {Registrar's Office.}The five remaining concerns are small,employing only two or three people.These include {a motor engineer,watchmaker,wine {trader,business consultant,vetinary {surgeon and a fuel merchant. }
